nodes.text: The Bent Lekku cantina was a cantina that was located in the city Kala'uun on the planet Ryloth. In about 32 BBY, the Army of Life member Del Binjitt hired a group of agents to transport some clodhoppers to the planet Stend IV and he stated that once the agents had completed their assignment, he would meet them in the Bent Lekku cantina to give them their payment.
